frozen.name: password-store
frozen.shortDescription: Stores, retrieves, generates, and synchronizes passwords securely.
frozen.longDescription:
pass is a very simple password store that keeps passwords inside gpg2
encrypted files inside a simple directory tree residing at
~/.password-store. The pass utility provides a series of commands for
manipulating the password store, allowing the user to add, remove, edit,
synchronize, generate, and manipulate passwords.
